# kiwi-heading-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                         | Type      | Default |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `withLeft`      | `with-left`      | Show slot `kiwi-heading-left`.      | `boolean` | `false` |
| `withRight`     | `with-right`     | Show slot `kiwi-heading-right`.     | `boolean` | `false` |
| `withSecondary` | `with-secondary` | Show slot `kiwi-heading-secondary`. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `withTop`       | `with-top`       | Show slot `kiwi-heading-top`.       | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot          | Description                                                                   |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"left"`      | Optional content to be displayed left of the primary heading, e.g. an icon    |
| `"primary"`   | Content for primary heading.                                                  |
| `"right"`     | Optional content to be displayed right, e.g. navigation                       |
| `"secondary"` | Optional secondary heading.                                                   |
| `"top"`       | Optional content to be displayed above the primary heading, e.g. a breadcrumb |
